document_data.name: Fleeting Fortune
document_data.mainbody: '''''Fleeting fortune''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s of [[Tymora]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell imbued a targeted creature with a small bit of the luck of Tymora.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, this spell required a [[divine focus]].
